amendment.description: Amendment expands and makes permanent the TRICARE Senior Prime demonstration program known commonly as Medicare Subvention for Medicare-eligible military retirees and their dependents.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 106-624 to expand and make permanent an existing DoD TRICARE Senior Prime demonstration program known commonly as Medicare Subvention.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Taylor (MS) amendment (A014) Agreed to by recorded vote: 406 - 10 (Roll no. 207).
